Title: Deathwatch (2)
Plot: The postliminary inquiries into Harry Newman's past and the identities of the possible twelve murder victims uncover a connection to the infamous trial and execution of a well known gangster.
GuestStars: David Hemmings,  Cheryl Hall,  Howard Goorney,  Lorraine Bent,  David de Keyser,  Steve Weston,  David Ashton,  Jonathan Tafler,  Ronald Pickup,  William Armstrong,  Tony Osoba,  Warren Mitchell,  Toby Mace,  Ada
